pages.text: What if you wish one of your clanmates was called Loudbelly?... That's what the Warrior Nametag is for! You can use this to give any cat any name you want. $(br2)$(8)Use the provided format to avoid glitches. e.g: 'Bengal pelt'. Result: 'Bengalpelt <genderSymbol>'$(br)
pages.title: Warrior Nametag
